block.p: Seema Kalia, a daughter of Jagan Nath Kalia of Toronto and the late Parkash Wati Kalia, was married yesterday to Vedula Rajanikanth Murti, a son of Santha Murti and Dr. Vedula N. Murti of Middletown, Pa. Dr. Satish Prakash, a Hindu priest, performed the ceremony at the Puck Building in New York.

Ms. Kalia, 33, is keeping her name. She is the senior director in New York for G&L Strategies, a consulting group advising companies on ways to improve their workplaces for women and minority employees. She graduated from Carleton University in Ottawa and received a law degree from Queen's University in Kingston, Ontario. Her father retired as an agent at Re/Max Realty in Mississauga, Ontario.

Seema Kalia, a daughter of Jagan Nath Kalia of Toronto and the late Parkash Wati Kalia, was married yesterday to Vedula Rajanikanth Murti, a son of Santha Murti and Dr. Vedula N. Murti of Middletown, Pa. Dr. Satish Prakash, a Hindu priest, performed the ceremony at the Puck Building in New York.

Ms. Kalia, 33, is keeping her name. She is the senior director in New York for G&L Strategies, a consulting group advising companies on ways to improve their workplaces for women and minority employees. She graduated from Carleton University in Ottawa and received a law degree from Queen's University in Kingston, Ontario. Her father retired as an agent at Re/Max Realty in Mississauga, Ontario.

Mr. Murti, 36, is a manager of a utilities hedge fund at SAC Capital Management in New York. He graduated cum laude from Pennsylvania State University, where his father is an assistant professor of economics and statistics.
